name: ai-medical-assistant
description: AI-Powered Virtual Medical Assistant and Smart Doctor Calling Agent

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../ml-model && pip install -r requirements.txt

author: Muhammad Aatir, Mudassir Rizwan, Shariq Mateen
